website_summaries.verdict: If you want a mountain bike by Diamondback and don't want to break your budget, pick this one. It's suitable for most surfaces, and ideal for the majority of riders including those who are new to mountain biking.
pros: A rugged mountain bike that falls on the lower end of price range than other Diamondback bikes in its class
Owners rave about the excellent suspension and smooth shifting between its 24 speeds
cons: Those who are new to mountain bike riding may find it heavy compared to other types of bikes
Gears may need a bit of tuning upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Great bike! As you can see my supervisor was ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bike! As you can see my supervisor was present to make sure I didn't screw up!! Super easy to put together and I'm by no means a bike mechanic. Instructions were pretty straight forward, took maybe an hour to get tire and chain on, set correct seat length and handle bars correctly aligned. Took it out for a short but quick ride (about 5 miles) and no issues, shocks absorbed potholes, curbs, etc. gears shift well and plenty of coasting on flat roads/sidewalks.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle H.

customer_reviews.title: love my diamondback
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of trails and cross country riding. This bike is great for what I do. I'm 78 years old and this bike is so easy to ride. Great beginner bike for mountain trails. I would not take it down a full throttle trail but it is a good starter bike for mountain trails and cross county trail riding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for entry level
customer_reviews.text: So I came from a Gary Fisher, Mountain bike no doubt a very good bike. After giving it to my 28 year old son. I wanted another decent mountain bike after look at lots of reviews and shopping Bike stores. IMO I felt this was the right bike for me. I am 5-10 and the Medium frame fits perfect. The bike is easy to put together comes with tools. It is a little on heavy side , but not bad for entry level seems well built. I have had on one trail so far its great. would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: wds

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner mountain bike
customer_reviews.text: Price is definitely on the lower end for an entry level bike. Excellent for beginners and surprised to upgraded parts considering the price. Most bike companies charge an additional $200 plus it seems, so plenty of value here.
customer_reviews.author: allen babauta

customer_reviews.title: Quality control is lacking
customer_reviews.text: Bike is perfect and I love it but out of the box my derailleur wasn't tuned correctly and wouldn't shift into the smallest gear, and the front brake cable wasn't tightened to the caliper at all. I mean barely any torque, and it slipped out while I was riding. Awesome bike though I highly recommend it but maybe take it to a shop if you don't know much about assembling bikes.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Instructions not included
customer_reviews.text: I think there should be an INSTRUCTION MANUAL in the package, but oh well. Watch a youtube video about how to put this together and you'll be done in 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged and easy to assemble. So far no complaints. All tools required to assemble included. Excellent quality. 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Beyond my expectations!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bike is way beyond my expectations !!! Price, quality, performance and very smooth to ride!!!. Perfect high quality entry level bike for beginners and not so much beginners!!! Strongly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos M Florez

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike, assembly was a bit more complex than I anticipated. Although, I purchased a used model that the initial owner messed the chain up. Once I got the chain on it was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Mike K

customer_reviews.title: 27.5 inch wheels, disc brakes, great looking!
customer_reviews.text: Great value bike! Got for my 13year old son. 27.5inch wheels are a great upgrade from 26 inch predecessors. Mechanical discs are nice and work as expected. It is not a $1k specialized or Trek, but it is perfect for my son’s use!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner bike
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a good bike. Easy to install. Front derailleur was a little bit off but I adjusted it by myself. Chain does have a good amount of chain slap so I added a chain guide. Seat is a little uncomfortable for me but thats about it. Next upgrades are going to be new seat, wider tires, and hydraulic brakes
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Was a great buy while it lasted. I ride everyday. Did some upgrades like a newer seat, Comfortable hand grips. A kick stand and bottle holder. Easy riding bike like the more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike
customer_reviews.text: Casual, bike path goer. Love this bike, feel like a kid again Love how light it is and it looks sharp! You'll need to purchase a kickstand and a new seat for it
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas D. Saucier

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a hell of a bike for the price. Diamondback support has been stellar as I managed to bend several components almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Miche

customer_reviews.title: Love this bike!!
customer_reviews.text: This bike is awesome!!! It rides smoothly too!!! It is built tough!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Gallardo

customer_reviews.title: it is fabulous
customer_reviews.text: The bike came with very good packing. The assembly is fairly straightforward, but somehow some manual in the package actually serves as a distraction. had to check youtube video to make sure. Sturdy, Ride very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Xin Feng

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Received missing parts and no reply from Manufacturer customer care It’s a pain to return as well
customer_reviews.author: Raman

customer_reviews.title: Yes to Diamondback
customer_reviews.text: This bike is definitely worth the cost. The cassette is smooth and I love the hearing! Feels light! All around smooth ride! A+ for DB!
customer_reviews.author: J-Bird

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: What a difference a decent bike makes. Been hitting the trails with this Diamondback and it’s been perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Good bike for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bike. Easy to install it by myself. I found friction between disk brakes and wheels. The problem has been solved by bending the rubbing part of the metal disks a little bit. However, don't recommend to buy it over 400.
customer_reviews.author: Wang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for the price. I made it into an e-bike, works great.
customer_reviews.author: 50met

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I have no mechanical expertise and it only took about 20 minutes to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Raspovic

customer_reviews.title: Well made bike.
customer_reviews.text: Well made bike. Rides is good. Gear Shifting is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Joseph March

customer_reviews.title: Good value, well packaged
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged and good looking bike. Graphics are different from photo, smaller and look a bit cheaper. Other than that, good value bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike well made got one that was dent so am ordering another
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike it looks like it is well made I bought an open box from warehouse deals but the one I got had a big dent on the side so I called amazon they sending me another. Update got the new bike new I took it for a ride best bike for the money really light bike.
customer_reviews.author: emeline encarnacion

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Bike for the price.. why pay more?! Go Diamondback!!
customer_reviews.author: chuck cheatham

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level mountain bike
customer_reviews.text: Great entry level mountain bike. Easy to assemble. Doesn't look like there is any room for a kickstand though, but not a big deal. Seat is adjustable, but rock hard.
customer_reviews.author: hasdrupal

customer_reviews.title: Rugged, tough, and reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Trustworthy and fast. I am extremely pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Designed

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a defective inner tube
customer_reviews.text: The bike may end up being fine, but the bike arrived with a defective inner tube. There are actually pinholes on the RIM SIDE of the tube. Brand new bike, I've ridden it for about 50 feet, and I have to buy a new tube. Do yourself a favor and buy your bike at a bike store, where you know that the bike is ready to go when you buy it. .
customer_reviews.author: Phillip M.

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Assembled the bike easily and went to ride it. Turns out when turn the pedal in the forward position is only about three inches from the tire, causing the from of your foot to drag on the tire. I do NOT have particularly large feet nor place them abnormally forward on the pedal, so this is just poor engineering. The fact is, this bike is dangerous to ride unless you only go in a straight line!
customer_reviews.author: pecos

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The bike itself is built well for the price. The customer service provided by Diamondback is HORRIBLE. I had asked for them to provide specifications so that I could purchase and replace a broken rim and a bent bottom bracket. Their advice was to got to a bike shop and ask for a comparable part. They answered neither question for the specifications. They instead suggest something that I was trying to avoid and was the opposite of helpful. Will not be purchasing another bike from them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First real mountain bike
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5,10 175lbs and bought the large model. It might be about 1/2-1” too tall for me according to the manufacturers guidelines but nothing that should interfere with the ride. The only complaint I had was with this being my first mountain bike I didn’t really know what I was doing so i had trouble installing the front wheel but after about 10 minutes got the breaks adjusted and wheel locked. For the money compared to something at Walmart for $250 this is a much better bike that will out last the big box store stuff for a very comparable price point.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I tried to patch it but just my luck it was on a seam and the patch didn't feel like working there
customer_reviews.text: I might give this more stars if I could actually ride it. It came with an inner tube that had 2 holes in it. I tried to patch it but just my luck it was on a seam and the patch didn't feel like working there. Now I get to go through the process of buying a new tube when it was brand new in the first place. And the cool part is its not a tube that you could just go to any old store like walmart, nope its a hard to find tube 27.5x1.75/2.10... thanks amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott M

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike for the money
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality. Too easy to build. Got my tools out before I opened the box and found tools are included. 3 nice hex keys and a pedal wrench. I'm 6ft 275lbs. Got the large. Took it for a spin today, and the bike didn't even care about my weight. I even tried to be cool and did a few bunny hops. No problems. Brakes are greatas well. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: mom3

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bike came with minor damage to the frame as well as a bent front rotor. I was refunded 40$ because I didn’t want to deal with shipping it back. That being said this is a great bike. For the price it’s nearly impossible to get the same quality. Minor upgrades and this bike could handle just about anything you can throw at it. Extremely good introductory bike with a wide range of upgrade options
customer_reviews.author: eric larson

product_meta.title: Diamond Back Bicycles Overdrive
feature_bullets: For charging the singletrack, big climbing days, and jumping into your local cross-country races, the Overdrive 29 3 offers a lively ride.
Durable aluminum frame is lightweight for comfort during long days
RockShox FS30 TK fork provides 100mm of plush travel
SRAM SX 1x12 drivetrain makes for simple and efficient shifting
Shimano MT200 hydraulic disc brakes provide plenty of stopping power

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
